content:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/doi-fixture-integration.yml", ".github/workflows/verify-build-artifacts.yml"]
SUMMARY: Added a minimal GitHub Actions CI workflow that runs the canonical runner on a tiny fixture, validates runtime/_build outputs, and uploads runtime/_build as an artifact on every run.
